DOC.brief_summary: This trial is conducted in Asia. The aim of this trial is to compare oral anti-diabetic drug (OAD) combined with insulin vs. insulin alone in subjects with type 2 diabetes not adequately controlled on the current OAD therapy.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Repaglinide Combined With Insulin in Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: HbA1c between 7.5 % and 13.0% (both inclusive) Fasting Cpeptide above or equal to 0.33 nmol/l BMI (Body Mass Index) between 25 and 32 kg/m2 (both inclusive) Medical history of treatment with insulin within the last 6 months Impaired renal function, defined as serum creatinine above to 1.7 mg/dl (150 Âµmol/l)
